text: "Guy Like Me" is a song co-written and recorded by American country music artist Pat Green. It was released in December 2003 as the second single from the album Wave on Wave. The song reached #31 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. The song was written by Green and David Neuhauser. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (2003-2004) !align="center"|Peak position |- |} ==References== Category:2003 singles Category:2003 songs Category:Pat Green songs Category:Songs written by Pat Green Category:Song recordings produced by Tony Brown (record producer) Category:Song recordings produced by Don Gehman Category:Universal Records singles Category:Republic Records singles
title: Guy Like Me
